// 코드 작성 테스트
console.log("hello world!");

const run = async () => {
  const posts = await getPosts();
  fs.mkdirSync(path.dirname(OUTPUT), { recursive: true });
  fs.writeFileSync(OUTPUT, JSON.stringify(posts, null, 2));
  console.log("✅ posts.json generated:", OUTPUT);
};

run();
